vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.22.1;
daughter of: Adaiah (H5718); married to Amon (H0526H);
mother of: Josiah (H2977)
§ Jedidah = "beloved"
the wife of king Amon and mother of king Josiah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hija de Adaías; esposa del rey Amón; madre del rey Josías
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶底大 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "心愛的"
猶大王亞們的妻子, 約西亞王的母親 (王下 22:1)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶底大 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "心爱的"
犹大王亚们的妻子, 约西亚王的母亲 (王下 22:1)
